name: Polyphobe
description:
You are an old school, one-button joystick. All these new fangled controllers just have too many buttons, time to destroy them all!

Attack with the tip of your cord.

Controls:
Menu control: mouse
Drive: WASD or arrows
Spin attack: Space
Return to menu: Esc

Credits:
Made for Winter 2018 ICT gam jam http://ictgamejam.com/ 

Team "Snack Infringement": Charlie Burnahm, Gideon Burnham, Sarah Dakan
